alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 21 at 9:58AM EST until February 21 at 3:44PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise. .The river is falling and should fall below flood stage later today. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 380.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage later today, and continue to fall to 377.1 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
